card.name: Border Village
card.text: +1 Card, +2 Actions - When you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.

card.name: Cache
card.text: 3 - When you gain this, gain two Coppers.

card.name: Cartographer
card.text: +1 Card, +1 Action. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

card.name: Crossroads
card.text: Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.

card.name: Develop
card.text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 more than it and a card costing exactly 1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

card.name: Duchess
card.text: +2 coin. Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back. - In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

card.name: Embassy
card.text: +5 cards, discard 3 cards - When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

card.name: Farmland
card.text: 2 VP - When you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 2 more than the trashed card.

card.name: Fool's Gold
card.text: If this is the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, this is worth 1, otherwise it's worth 4 - When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.

card.name: Haggler
card.text: +2 - While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

card.name: Highway
card.text: +1 Card, +1 Action - While this is in play, cards cost 1 less, but not less than 0.

card.name: Ill-Gotten Gains
card.text: 1. When you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand. - When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.

card.name: Inn
card.text: +2 Cards, +2 Actions, Discard 2 cards. - When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.

card.name: Jack of all Trades
card.text: Gain a Silver. Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back. Draw until you have5 cards in hand. You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

card.name: Mandarin
card.text: +3 coin. Put a card from your hand on top of your deck. When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.

card.name: Margrave
card.text: +3 Cards, +1 Buy. Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

card.name: Noble Brigand
card.text: +1coin, When you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn't reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.

card.name: Nomad Camp
card.text: +1 Buy, +2 Coin - When you gain this, put it on top of your deck

card.name: Oasis
card.text: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Coid, Discard a card.

card.name: Oracle
card.text: Each player (including you) reveals thte top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses. +2 Cards.

card.name: Scheme
card.text: +1 Card, +1 Action. At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

card.name: Silk Road
card.text: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

card.name: Spice Merchant
card.text: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. If you do, choose one: +2 Cards and +1 Action; or +2 Coin and +1 Buy.

card.name: Stables
card.text: You may discard a Treasure. If youdo, +3 Cards and +1 Action

card.name: Trader
card.text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in coins. - When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a Silver.

card.name: Tunnel
card.text: 2 VP - When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.
